title: Young Jebediah Springfield
description: In 1796, a fiercely determined band of pioneers leaves Maryland after misinterpreting a passage in the Bible. Their destination? New Sodom. This is their story.
quote: On this site we shall build a new town, where we can worship freely, govern justly, and grow vast fields of hemp for making rope and blankets.
altHero: Jebediah Springfield, mustached man wearing a racoon cap
alt3: closeup of Jebediah riding the buffalo
alt4: Jebediah speaks with a young boy
